EmailTemplate.name: 4.2.3 Autumn: Notification of payment
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification of Payment for {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c}
Dear {!Job_placement__c.Contact_Name__c},
Payment notification for NCS: PC, NCS: TC and NCS: RCD.
We hope that you enjoyed your role on NCS with The Challenge.
You will receive your pay for {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c} on {!Job_placement__c.Payroll_payment_date__c}. This pay constitutes your work between the dates of {!Job_placement__c.Assignment_start_date__c} and {!Job_placement__c.Assignment_end_date__c} for {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}.
Your full gross pay for this part of the role is {!Job_placement__c.Total_Amount_to_Pay__c}. This payment covers a total of {!Job_placement__c.days_worked__c} working days. This is subject to tax and National Insurance contributions.
If you are involved in working on the NCS: Real Challenge Action and/or NCS: Graduation for the autumn programme, you will receive further payments through our later payrolls.
On your payslip (sent via email on {!Job_placement__c.Payroll_payment_date__c}), you will see the total amount which you will receive.
Due to new auto-enrolment legislation, employees of The Challenge, including seasonal staff, may be enrolled in a workplace pension scheme. This is a way of saving for your retirement that's arranged by your employer. For further information, please go to www.gov.uk/workplace-pensions. Further information about workplace pensions and how to opt-out can be found on the staffing website under FAQs.
If you have any questions please let us know quoting the email reference number in any correspondence.
Yours sincerely,
NCS with The Challenge {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c} CR 4.2.3
